Invocation Name: e. pragathi
des: In future, Governments will be more connected than ever before by being FAST (Flat, Agile, Streamlined, and Tech-Savvy). With its ability to manage complexity, e-Pragati will emerge as the essential means to drive public sector transformation and realize connected government with demonstrable benefits.
